Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or

It has been  years since we were introduced to Monstropolis and the citys power company Monsters Inc. where

screamenergy is harnessed from terrified children PERIOD Thats where we met the furry blue giant named James P PERIOD Sullivan

and hiswisecracking limegreen cyclops buddy Mike Wazowski PERIOD

DisneyPixars  brings us back to the time when Sully and Mike were not quite BFFs PERIOD When Mike

voiced by Billy Crystal steps on to the Monsters U campus hes determined to become one of the top scarers PERIOD Mike

believes if he works hard and studies harder he can be the best PERIOD But his plan gets thwarted by the Big Man on Campus

Sully voicedby John Goodman whose father was a famous scarer PERIOD Slacker Sullivan thinks he can get by with his

natural talent PERIOD





The rivalry between Sully and Mike escalates until they are deemed unworthy by the School of Scarings Dean

Hardscrabblevoiced by a wonderfully wicked Helen Mirren PERIOD In order to get back into her notsogood graces they join

Oozma Kappa aband of misfit monsters to compete in the annual Scare Games  think a cuddlier humorous Hunger

Games PERIOD Along theway they learn about teamwork and friendship PERIOD

While  is visually stunning in candycolored pastels the story feels paintbynumbers PERIOD  has

moments of good humor but it doesnt match the wit or inventiveness of  In fact the 3D version is

almost unnecessary except for one of the key scenes at the end when Mike tries to prove his worth PERIOD

When I asked my 12yearold what he felt the message of the movie was he said 

DisneyPixars decision to give it the old college try with a prequel should have played to the storytelling strengths of the

original PERIOD

Dont miss the bonus short  a delightful wordless romance that tracks two umbrellas on a rainy day PERIOD A

simple satisfying prelude to a night of animation PERIOD



MONSTERS UNIVERSITY

 out of  stars

Rated G  min
